## Checklist

- [ ] Added or updated tests (unit and/or integration as appropriate)
- [ ] CI green (pytest + integration tests pass)
- [ ] Docker image sanity check passed (CI builds and runs container)
- [ ] New or changed analyzer templates validated (`python template_loader.py --validate templates/<name>.json`)
